xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/506861-Der Ötztalmann und seine Welt. Das Jahr bevor er schlief 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/aw5glmLkrIHS7U5cw6U6w6PZ4nb.jpg A severely injured man lies in the snow-capped mountains; the next settlement which could offer warmth and shelter from the wind and snow is too far to reach on foot. In a flashback, the dying man relives the last year of his life - a life full of adventure, danger and his daily struggle to survive in a harsh and frightening world. Der Ötztalmann und seine Welt. Das Jahr bevor er schlief
